page.title: 03Housing (continued)
page.content: bought by the tenants and these are in better condition. Elsewhere,estates of modern semi and detached houses have been built on the slopes behind the main roads.These houses are well-kept,attractive and popular.Most have been built since 1960.All have gardens at the front and to the rear. "My garden has grass and moss and flowers round the edge.There are trees and bushes near the house.The back gets the sun so you can have your meals out there.My dog loves the back,she chases about in it.Flowers including azaleas,delphiniums,lupins and ice plants." Most of these houses are in Bradshaw,Harwood and Bromley Cross. The new houses have engulfed the old ones and so the area has become built up in postwar years.
